T02TD2512.3E:54b-4: / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rtag pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-5: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor gzhan du ma bsgrubs pa'am /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-7: dkyil 'khor ma grub pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-8: gal te sgrub par byed na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-9: de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-10: bsgrub bya min 'dir cung zad med //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-11: ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-12: las ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-13: bde ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ste bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-14: de'i phyir grub pa'i las kyi bde ba rnams /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-15: rtogs pa thams cad las nye bar thob pas na bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-16: de ltar sgrub par byed pa po la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-18: rtogs pa gzhan rnams la gang zhig phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub zla ba bzhis 'grub par 'gyur ba de nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:54b-19: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-21: // / slar yang gsal bar bya ba'i phyir cho ga thams cad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-22: ji lta ba bzhin du bdag bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-24: khrus dang ji skad bshad pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:54b-25: rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang bas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'am /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-0: gcig pu lugs ma'am brdungs ma la sogs pa'i dngos po bzhugs @55a * //
T02TD2512.3E:55a-1: su gsol la slar yang bdag bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-2: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs kyi chu lha'i mchod pa lngas yongs su bsangs la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-3: rdo rje me lan gsum yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-4: me tog la sogs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis slar yang yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-5: aargha'i phyag rgyas yi ge h'um lan bdun bzlas pa aargha la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas nas bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-6: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs kyi chu lha'i khang pa'i sgor yongs su bsang ba'i phyir bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-7: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02TD2512.3E:55a-8: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
T02TD2512.3E:55a-9: bdag byin brlab sogs bsgrub pa yis //
T02TD2512.3E:55a-10: mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.3E:55a-11: de la dang po yi ge h'um brjod cing dang po'i rdo rje bcings te sa la bzhag la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-12: aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas ;
T02TD2512.3E:55a-13: phun sum tshogs pa yod na me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing 'tshal te /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-14: sngom pa gzung ba'i bar mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstod pa snga ma bzhin rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-16: ji lta ba bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:55a-17: de nas yid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis bzhugs te /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-18: dang po'i rdo rjes der gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-19: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-20: dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga na gnas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khongs su chud par bsams la /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-21: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas skabs su yi ge hr'i: las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma rnams rdzogs par byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:55a-22: brten pa'i lus po'i phyi rol gyi mdun du sna tshogs padma'i gdan gyi steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sprul te /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-0: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi @55b phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-1: bcing ba dang dbang du byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-2: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis blta bar byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-3: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings nas /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-4: dza: dpa' mchog dang po rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2512.3E:55b-5: zhes bya ba'i glus 'khor dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi lus la rang gi gnas su bcug la /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-6: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rab tu bsgrubs la /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-7: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brten pa'i lus dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku la rab tu bcug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-8: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dang po'i yi ge rdo rjes snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-10: mgrin pa dang spyi bor rang gi bdag nyid de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-11: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba blangs te /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-12: yi ge gnyis kyi go chas bdag nyid go bgos nas de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-13: chos dang dam tshig rnams blangs te dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-14: rjes su sgrub pa byas nas rang gi snying gar snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la lha dgod pa'i cho gas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rdo rje dril bu ma'i bar rnams rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgod par byas nas de bzhin du /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-15: badzra a'atma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum brjod cing de'i don gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor bdag yin no zhes bya ba rang nyid kyis brjod cing rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid nges par byas nas lha mo thams cad kyi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-17: de nyid yid kyis rdo rje'i ngag gam rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag gis brjod cing /
T02TD2512.3E:55b-18: ji srid du nyin re lan cig bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-0: ji srid mngon du gyur pa bzhin du nyin re @56a * //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-1: bsgom pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-2: de nas de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-3: de ltar mchog tu bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-4: yang na ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sgom pa nas brtsams la de ji srid du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par byas te ji srid mngon du mthong bar 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-5: de nas de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-6: yang na tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshul gyis sngon du bsnyen pa byas la mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-7: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-8: sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas ji lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-10: gdan rnams rdzogs par byas la brla gnyis la dril bu gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-11: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang bar byas la yan lag gis phyag byas la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang ;
T02TD2512.3E:56a-13: las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-14: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la yi ge h'um brjod cing de la brtson pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-16: bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-17: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-18: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-19: snying po 'di yi rtogs pas ni //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-20: bde ba chen po myur sgrub byed //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-22: de nas langs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-23: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-25: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56a-26: de la dang po'i rdo rjes /
T02TD2512.3E:56a-27: h'um badzra tishtha sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i ma h'a sa ma ya mandala au da tha pa ya zhes brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bteg la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-0: nam @56b mkha'i phyogs su bzhugs su gsol te snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes gnas bzhir yi ge h'um dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-1: slar yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-2: badzra tishtha ma ta ces bya ba mig gnyis su rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-3: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin las ;
T02TD2512.3E:56b-4: / kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-5: yi ge h'um ni brjod bya zhing //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-6: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-7: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i dngos po'i dkyil 'khor bkug la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-8: byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-9: snga ma bzhin du phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-10: de nas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi srung ba thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-13: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgo yongs su bsang ba'i don du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i chus dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-15: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po rnams kyis lan bdun gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i dri'i mandala rnams lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-16: mandala de rnams la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi snyid po bkod la /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-17: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod la phyi rol du gtor ma byin la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' rnams so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa de'i cho gas lhag par gnas par byas la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du bzhag nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-20: sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyi re re zhing yang mar la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-21: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mchod cing phyag byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:56b-22: bcom ldan 'das la mchod yon phul la slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:56b-23: de bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-1: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-2: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod cing phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-3: zab pa dang rgya chen po'i chos slob ma rnams la bstan par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-4: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i mthar rmi lam brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-5: de nas skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su mal nas langs te snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-6: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho gas de bzhin du nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-7: de nas de bzhin du rdul tshon bkye bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi lte ba la lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas bris la /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris de shar phyogs su mngon par phyogs par bzhag la /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-10: aom su ra ta stvam h'um zhes bya bzlos shing nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-11: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ras ris de la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-12: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams kyis so //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-13: de la g-yas phyogs na bzhugs pa'i k'i li k'i las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas spro ba bskyed par 'gyur bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-14: k'i li k'i la'i g-yas phyogs na 'dod chags rdo rje ma ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-15: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i gzhu blangs te /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-16: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' gsor ba la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-17: rdo rje dran ma ni phyag g-yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs su 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-19: rdo rje dran ma'i g-yon logs su rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57a-20: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas bsnyems pa mdzad nas phyag g-yas pas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te des bcom ldan 'das bsnun par mdzad par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-22: dus kyi mchod pa dgod par bya //
T02TD2512.3E:57a-23: rab tu dga' ma'i dga' ba dang //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-0: spyan dang @57b de bzhin dpal chen mo //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-1: me tog spos dang mar me che //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-2: dri rnams steng du ka pu tas //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-3: lha mo rdo rje rgyal mo rnams //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-4: de yi phyag rgya bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-5: he badzra ra ti ma h'a ra ti badzra ho //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-8: sgeg mo bzhad ma glu ma che //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-9: gar ma lha yi bu mo'i tshogs //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-10: 'di dag sgeg ma'i rdo rje ma //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-11: phyi yi mtshams su dgod par bya //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-12: he ra ti badzra bi la si na tra ta /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-13: bi ga ba ti badzra ha sa ha ha /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-14: he ra ti badzra gi te te te /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-15: he ra ti badzra ni ti pe pa pe pa /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-16: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa ma //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-17: rdo rje lcags sgrog dril pu ma //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-18: sgo srung ma ni bzhi po dag / sgo rnams la ni bzhugs pa yin ;
T02TD2512.3E:57b-22: badzra gha nte ho: zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'i phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-24: de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha mo bzhi po ni rab tu grags pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-27: lcags kyu ma rnams ni sku mdog dkar dmar ro //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-30: zhags pa ma la sogs pa rnams ni pla ksha ltar dkar ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-33: lcags sgrog ma rnams ni autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs pa'i mdog can no //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-36: dril bu ma'i sku mdog ser mo'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-38: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te sgo dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-39: slar yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-40: 'dud pa byas nas mtshan brgya rtsas bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:57b-41: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-42: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings te /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-43: dza mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyan 'dren pa'i glus bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bkug la dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:57b-44: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis sgo rnams bcad la /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-0: rdo rje go chas go bkon nas yi ge h'um brjod cing @58a * //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-1: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-2: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-3: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-8: lcags kyu ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-12: zhags pa ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-16: lcags sgrog ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-17: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-20: rdo rje dril bu ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par grub pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-21: de nas mchod yon phul ba bum pa gang ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-22: phyi rol du gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-23: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-25: sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyis de bzhin du sbyin sreg byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-26: thab khung gi dbus su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa yi ge h'um la sogs pa brjod cing me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bkod la /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-27: mar la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams re re zhing yang yi ge h'um gis brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-28: 'dod chags rdo rje ma sogs kyi //
T02TD2512.3E:58a-29: snying po rnams kyis bdun bdun bsreg / de nas yi ge h'um la sogs pa brjod cing me tog dag kho nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gcig tu byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-30: ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi gdong g-yogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-31: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sngom pa snga ma bzhin du blangs nas /
T02TD2512.3E:58a-32: aom sarba yo gtsi tta au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-0: g-yas @58b pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs te /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-1: rang gi snying gar yi ge h'um gis bkod la 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-2: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-3: badzra siddhe ya th'a su kham zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-4: de nas sgo'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chu g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis blangs pa des yi ge h'um brjod cing bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-5: ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan can gyi rdo rje shugs kyis /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-6: rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-7: spyi bor me tog ka su ta //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-8: rdo rje glu yis gar bya zhing //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-9: grong khyer du ni rab 'jug bya //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-10: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-11: thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-12: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-13: dza: h'um bam ho: rab tu grub par mdzod //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-15: shar gyi sgo nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje lcags kyu mas bdag nyid bkug par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-16: de nas lho'i sgo nas de bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-17: rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-18: de nas de bzhin du nub kyi sgo nas 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-19: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-20: de nas slar yang byang gi sgo nas de bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-21: rdo rje dril bu ma'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-22: slar yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-23: ma h'a ra su tri ta su tro sha su su kho badzra sa tva aa dya siddha mam zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-24: de nas rdo rje gar las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-25: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mig gis ni //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-26: de yi mgon po la phyag bya //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-27: g-yon bsnyems bzhin pas bstod pa yis ;
T02TD2512.3E:58b-28: / sgeg ma'i mig ni btsums pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-29: aom mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol bar ldan //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-30: sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-31: dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi he //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-32: mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-33: slar yang 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug la de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:58b-35: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-36: rdo rje chen po nor che ba //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-37: ye shes chen po las chen po //
T02TD2512.3E:58b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag grub //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-2: pra ti siddhi mam zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-3: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-4: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral zhing h'um aa zhes bya bas lan brgya brjod cing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-5: de nas me tog sil ma gtor bar bya ste //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-6: ka pu ta yi thal mo ni ;
T02TD2512.3E:59a-7: / spyi bor bzhag ste phab nas kyang //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-8: sgeg bcas mthe bong mthe chung bar //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-9: bkrol nas rdo rje 'dzin la dbul //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-10: de nas phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags brjod cing bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-11: de nas phreng ba de sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya ste //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-12: 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-13: sems can kun la bde stsol ba //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-14: thams cad grub phyir rdor 'dzin gyi //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-15: de ring khyed la dbang bskur mdzad //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-16: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva stvam aa bhi shinytsa su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-17: de nas badzra tsa kshu sa ma ya sarbam su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-18: de nas yi ge h'um las mig gnyis su rdo rje rnam par bsams la he badzra p'a shya zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-19: rdo rje lcags kyu ma nas brtsams te dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor la blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-20: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings te dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59a-21: rdo rje thal mo bskor bshis par brjod pa sbyin pa'i tshul gyis snying ga'i phyogs su bzung zhing mtshan brgya rtsas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-22: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi dang glu dang gar gyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-23: rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lus la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par bkod nas /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so'i sbyor bas de bzhin du lus kun la yang dag par bcug la bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-26: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi sgor mngon par phyogs par sna tshogs padma bris te /
T02TD2512.3E:59a-27: de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos nye bar 'dug pa'am /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-0: yang na dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du sna tshogs padma bris @59b pa'i ras ris kyis bkab pa'i seng ge'i gdan la 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-1: mchod yon phul la sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lngas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-2: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs te dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-3: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-4: de yang aom badzra aa bhi shi nytsa h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-5: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal pa'i chu //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa mna' bsgag pa'i snying po yang brjod cing bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-7: de nas gos dang rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan la /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-8: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-9: phyi'i yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-10: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-11: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-12: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-13: de nas phyi'i me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-14: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-15: de nas de kho na nyid chos dang dam tshig rnams blangs la dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas snying po dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das las blangs la tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-19: slar yang bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-20: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa byas te 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-21: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-23: // / de nas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:59b-24: rdo rje mchod yon bskor zhing gnas //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-25: snying gar bzhag ste gdong bskyod pa'i //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-26: spyi bos yang dag phyag byas nas //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-27: dngos grub thams cad rab grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-28: bde ba chen po chags pa che//
T02TD2512.3E:59b-30: lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-31: bstod de dkyil 'khor du gzhug bya //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-32: de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-33: bde chen yang dag mchod nas ni //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-34: rdo rje bzung nas dbang bskur phyir //
T02TD2512.3E:59b-35: de bzhin slob ma 'jug par bya //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-3: dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su bzung pa'i slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas par byas pas sdom pa gzung bar bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-4: des kyang slob dpon la phyag byas nas //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-5: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-6: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-7: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-8: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-9: dam tshig nyid de bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-10: sdom pa yang ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-12: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i gos kyis stod g-yogs byas shing /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-13: rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa yongs su bzlas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i gos kyi gdong g-yogs dang ldan zhing /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-14: me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i dri zhim por byas pa'i slob ma phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-16: aom sarba yo ga tsi tta au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-17: de bzhin du de'i snying gar su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-18: de rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-19: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas yon gyi mchog blangs la rdo rje shugs kyis rang 'jug pa'i tshul du bcug nas /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-20: dga' ba chen po ni zhes bya ba brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-21: de nas de la ji lta ba bzhin du dbab pa bskyed la /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-22: de bzhin du slob ma med tog dor du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-23: de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba de la byin nas de'i gdong g-yogs dgrol bar byas la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-24: de nas slar yang 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing du bcug nas de nyid kyi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60a-25: de nas de bzhin du de nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-26: de'i lus la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi sa bkod la /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de /
T02TD2512.3E:60a-28: slob dpon dbang bskur ba'i cho gas yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-0: ming gi dbang bskur ba rnams kyis @60b dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-1: de nas de la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-2: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-3: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pas de yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-4: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po'i bshad pa byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-7: dam tshig rnams de la sbyin te /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-8: dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa slob tu gzhug go //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-9: de nas tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-10: mna' sngon du song ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-11: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes byin la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-13: lung bstan pas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-14: de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-15: sngon du spyod pa byas pa'i slob ma'i cho ga dang bcas pas rjes su bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-16: so sor rjes su bsgrub pa byin la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-17: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bris pa'i dkyil 'khor ram /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-19: brdungs pa'i lha'i sku dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-20: rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis brla gnyis la bcings te /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-21: des de rgyun mchad par dkrol zhing sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i don bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-22: slar yang g-yas pa'i rol mo dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa'i bi wang la sogs pa dang ;
T02TD2512.3E:60b-23: de kho na nyid kyi glu dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um gi glus rjes su bsgrub par byas pa'i snod du gyur pa'i slob ma'i cho gas rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gzhag par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-24: slob ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor bskor ba lta bu'i gar byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gdong brnyan rang gi gdong la bgos la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par brgyan la /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-27: de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-28: dang por re zhig rgyal mtshan gyi ming can gyi rjes su sgrub pa pos gnas gang du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:60b-30: ci mdzad ces bya ba dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:60b-32: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-0: thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug / mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i @61a * //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-2: dza: h'um bam ho: rab tu grub par mdzod //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-3: ces bya ba'i 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa dang bcas pas bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-4: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsams pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-5: rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i ji ltar rtogs pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-6: rjes su mthun pa'i glu'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-9: dam tshig mchod ni sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-11: ji srid gsang ba mchog ces bya ba'i bar gyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtam bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-12: dkyil 'khor gzhan du rab tu 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-14: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-15: de nas dang po'i gnas nyams dga' //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtam bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-17: rang gi mtshan ma bzung ste /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-18: don gyi tshul gyis lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la snying po brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-19: de ltar 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pas rang gi lha'i gtam gyis phyag mtshan blangs te don gyi tshul sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-20: phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-21: rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas la de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-22: de nas bsgoms pas ngal na slar yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-23: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-24: de nas ngal bsos la yi ge h'um gi glu de nyid de kho na nyid kyi glu dang bcas pa brjod cing /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-25: phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa byas na /
T02TD2512.3E:61a-26: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rang gi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-27: gal te grub par ma gyur na ngal bso zhing khrus la sogs pa byas la zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-28: mthar nya la mtshan thog thag ngal bso zhing phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-29: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa byon te tshogs dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rdo rje la zhugs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-30: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61a-31: dpal mchog dang po ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.3E:61b-0: de la de bzhin @61b gshegs pa thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can te /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-1: de dag gi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba nye bar mtshon pa gang yin pa de'i cho ga ni rtogs pa ste de'i grub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-2: sgrub par byed pa ston pa'i ngo bo yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61b-3: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bshad ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-5: // / de nas 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-7: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa rjod par byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-8: dang po sbyor ba 'das ma thag pa nyid du'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61b-9: dang la rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61b-10: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu la'o //
T02TD2512.3E:61b-11: gang gi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa pos sum 'gyur gyi dngos grub grub par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-12: mchog ste phul du byung ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:61b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams te /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-14: de dag gi dam tshig chen po gsum ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad du bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2512.3E:61b-16: nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de'i dngos grub kyi don du gsang ba'i cho gar gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtogs pa skabs su bab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-2: sangs rgyas dang chos dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-3: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtogs par gyur pas na sangs rgyas te /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-4: byang chub chen po'i sems kyi mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni chos so //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-6: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes las byung ba gzugs thams cad ston pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin ni dge 'dun no //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-7: gsum po de dag nam mkha'i khams thams cad la khyab nas bzhugs te /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-8: de'i phyir dam tshig chen po gsum po 'di yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-9: dkon mchog gsum po 'di dag gzugs gang gis gang du bri bar bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-10: ras zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog gi gzugs can gyi dkon mchog gsum po 'di ni ras la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-13: go cha bcas te go cha dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-14: rdo rje mchog gi go cha mchog la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu mdzes shing legs par brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-15: de'ang phyag mtshan ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-16: rdo rje mtshon cha bstod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-17: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' ni rdo rje mtshon cha ste /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-18: de bstod pa ni gyen du 'degs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-19: rdo rje mtshon cha bstod pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-21: rin po che chen po 'chang ba ni //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-22: rdo rje mtshon cha bstod pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-24: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-26: ras kyi dbus su sna tshogs padma'i steng du g-yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis gzhu bzung nas /
T02TD2512.3E:62a-27: phyag g-yas pas mda' bstod pa la sogs pa brtson pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62a-28: padma de nyid du rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yas logs su padma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i chos bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-0: padma de nyid du rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yon logs su @62b rdo rje rin po che 'dzin pa'i nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-1: de dag thams cad 'od kyi 'khor lo gcig dang /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-2: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs so //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-3: gnas gang du ras la dkon mchog gsum 'di bri bar bya ba yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-4: 'khor lo de ni brtags nas su //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-6: zhes bya ba la 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste phul du byung ba yang dag par bris la /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-7: de'i dbus kyi re'u mig la dkon mchog gsum gyi ras ris bri bar bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-8: de bris nas de'i rjes la ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-9: ci rigs par ni bsgrubs byas na //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-11: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni ci rigs pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-12: de las mi 'da' par dkon mchog gsum 'di bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-13: de ltar bsgrubs na sum 'gyur du 'grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-14: rdzogs shing mngon du 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni sum 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-16: de dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'chad la sogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i dkon mchog gsum sum 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga des rnal 'byor pa la grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-18: snying po gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di sprul nas bri bar bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-19: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgra nye bar dgod pa la'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-20: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs ka la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po gsum rdzogs par byed pa'i nges pa'i shes bzhi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i mchog gi snying po ste /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-22: de ston par byed pa'i sgra yang nye bar btags nas de nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:62b-23: de yang las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:62b-24: mchog gi dngos grub ma lus par stsol ba'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi dngos grub bzung bas rigs thams cad kyis dngos grub ster bas nam chog gi dngos grub ma lus par stsol ba'i snying @63a * //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-2: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-3: yi ge aom ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-4: yi ge bh'u ni rdo rje dbang phyug go //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-5: yi ge kham ni nam mkha' ste 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-7: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-8: dam tshig gsum po mchog yin te //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-9: aom bh'u kham du yang dag bshad //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-10: sangs rgyas phyag rgya brda ru byas //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-12: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te ji srid aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-13: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-14: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas 'dir bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-15: bsgom pa bya ba yin no zhes cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-16: khyim mam zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyis las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-17: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-18: khyim zhes bya ba ni rab tu grags pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-19: nags tshal zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i rigs can gyi shing drung gi tshogs so //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-20: de dag 'dir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas nye bar mdzes shing yang dag par brgyan la /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-21: snga ma bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi cho gas rang 'jug pa'i cho ga thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-22: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-23: mchog gi mtshon cha'i cho gas thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs lnga'i bshad pa byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-25: 'di brjod pas te slob ma rnams la bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-26: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la de nyid ni dngos po'i rigs pas bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnams yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-27: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don du'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63a-28: byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-30: nam mkha'i snying po rnams te /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63a-35: don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-0: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyon @63b mongs pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-3: 'chi ba dag gi bdud bcom par mdzad na bcom ldan 'das te /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-4: de'i phyir 'chi bdag gi bdud la sogs pa dang bral bas 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu rdo rje 'chang dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-6: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-7: de dag ci mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-8: lta ngan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-9: 'khor ba la rtag pa'i 'du shes can gang yin pa de ni lta ba ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams so //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-10: de dag gi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-11: sh'akya'i rigs la sogs pa'i skye ba yongs su bzhes pa mdzad nas sprul ba'i sku yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos ton par mdzad do //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-12: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus ni ma yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-13: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis lta ba ngan pa dang ldan ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin cing mya ngan las 'das pa ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-14: ma lus pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad de /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-15: de 'dul ba dang lung dang rtogs pa la rab tu bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-16: de'i don du brtson pa ni spro ba'i brtson 'grus te /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-17: der brtan pa'i nges pa ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-18: des go cha dang bcas pa ni sems can gyi don du go cha dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-19: shin tu srid pa la gnas pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-20: de nyid mchog ste phul du byung ba'i go cha la sogs pa gang yin pa bgos pa de ni shin tu srid pa'i gnas mchog gi go cha la sogs pa bgos pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-21: sogs pa'i sgra ni cod pan dang /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-24: dpung rgyan la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-25: dkon mchog gsum nyid nye bar 'gro ba ni thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-26: dkon mchog gsum nyid nye bar 'gro bde gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-27: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
T02TD2512.3E:63b-29: de dag la ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-30: shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:63b-31: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bskyed pa ni shin tu srid pa grub pas te /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-0: de nyid rnam par dag pa'i @64a * //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-1: dpal ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin can gyi mdangs gang yin pa de dag gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-2: rnam par dag pa'i dpal mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-3: mchog ni phul du byung ba ste rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yin no zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-4: de kho na nyid 'di brjod pa gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-9: don yod grub pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-10: de rnams kyi mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-11: thog ma dang tha ma med pa gnyis su med pa'i thugs rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir gsang ba'i rdo rje de nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-13: / rdo rje'i don 'di mngon du byas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs te gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-14: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis gzung ste /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dril bu chos kyi dril bu dkrol cig ces bya ba'i cho gas 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-16: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-17: de nas kyi sgras ni skabs la bab pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-18: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab po //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-19: de ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni dril bu'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-20: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-21: zhes bya ba la 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi dngos po thams cad don dam par nam mkha'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-22: nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:64a-23: nam mkha' yang ni mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-24: ces bya ba la rdzas thams cad med pa'i mtshan nyid can ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD2512.3E:64a-25: ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang mtshan nyid med pa yin no zhes bya ba yang gi sgras ni ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-0: don dam par chos thams cad gdong ma nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir @64b ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-1: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-2: de'i sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba de bzhin nyid ro gcig pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-3: rgyu de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa des kun mchog mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-4: de la gsal ni khyab par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-6: sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyis nam mkha'i dang mnyam pa nyid du khyab par rnal 'byor pas thob pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-7: lhag par mos pa 'dis rnal 'byor bas dril bu dkrol bar bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-9: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-10: nam mkha' yang ni mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-11: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-12: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-13: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra ni dril bu sgrogs pa yin no zhes bya bas dril bu dkrol bar bya zhing //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-14: de'i sgra la lhag par mos par bya pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-15: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis rlobs shig ces bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-18: de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-19: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-20: chen po yang de yin la dam tshig gsum yang de yin pas na dam tshig chen po gsum ste /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-21: dkon mchog gsum gyi sku'i gsang ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-22: de'i rang bzhin gyi bsgom pa ni sdom pas te de brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-23: longs spyod kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na longs spyod kun te /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-24: rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-25: de rnams longs spyod pa ni de'i rang bzhin la lhag par mos pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-26: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-27: longs spyod thams cad la longs spyod par byed par 'gyur ba kho nas zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-28: de dag gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba brjod cing rang nyid mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-29: de dag khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:64b-30: bsten pa ste bsgom par bya ba rnams kyis so //
T02TD2512.3E:64b-31: rang gi bdag nyid las su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-1: nyid ni byed par gyur pas so //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-2: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-3: mchog ni dam pas te nang du brjod pa'i rnam pas brjod pa ni bsam zhing bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi so sor rtog pa'i mchod pa 'dis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o ;
T02TD2512.3E:65a-4: / dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sngom pa 'di las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-6: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po ni rnal 'byor te /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-7: de sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-10: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-11: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-12: de nas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la ;
T02TD2512.3E:65a-13: gzugs gang dang gang gis sems can gdul bar 'gyur pa'i gzugs de dang de rnams kyis rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-14: de nas bdag nyid kyis bya ba byas pa lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs par bsams la bzlas pa'am bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-15: thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-16: zhes bya ba la de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-18: dam tshig gzung ba'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs kyi cho gas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-21: don yod grub pa rigs dang bcas pa rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-22: kyang gi sgras ni gcig la yang ngo zhes bstan to //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-23: bza' min pa yang bza' byas na //
T02TD2512.3E:65a-24: zhes bya ba la ba'i bar bya bas na bza' ba ste /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-25: rnal 'byor pas rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-26: de'i sems can gyi khams ma lus par rang rang gi rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs su byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:65a-27: rang gi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-0: bza' bar bya ba ma yin @65b pas na bza' bar mi bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-1: rigs gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs rnams so //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-2: bza' bar mi bya ba de rnams kyang bza' zhing rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub sangs rgyas nyid kyi mtshan nyid can rtag pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste de rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum ni de yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-5: de ltar brjod nas zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la bstan nas /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-6: snying po byin pa de dag phyag rgya chen po bcing ba la sogs pa slob tu bcug nas /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-7: de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho gas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams la snying po byin nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes tshigs su bcad pa gzhan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi slob dpon te des sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-10: rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-11: zhes bya ba la ro dang bza' ba dang rnam par rol pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-12: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par byas na'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-13: de nas ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-14: ci 'dod spyod pa'i mchod pa yis //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-15: slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug / ces bya ba la phyi'i me tog la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-16: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis slob ma'i tshogs thams cad mchod pa byad du gzhug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-17: longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-18: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-19: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu pa la'o //
T02TD2512.3E:65b-20: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pas she na /
T02TD2512.3E:65b-21: dkon mchog gsum la phul ba zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-0: mdzes pa'i dkon mchog gsum ni dkon mchog @66a * //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-6: dkon mchog gzhan thams cad las phul du byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-7: de las sprul pa'i longs spyod la longs spyod pa rnams ni phyi'i rin po che la sogs pa thams cad kyi rang gi bdag nyid dang /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-9: gal te mngon par 'dod na yang dag par mchod na slob dpon de ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub cing grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-11: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa bral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho gas thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-12: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-13: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-14: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-15: rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du blta ba skyil mo krung gi steng du yang dag par bzhag la /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-16: rdo rje'i dbus su bkod pa'i snying po de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-17: dbyangs bcu drug dang bcas ba'i de nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid can du rang gi sems bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-18: slar yang de'i steng du snying po de nyid kyis mngon par bris la /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-19: yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-20: slar yang snying po de dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-21: slar yang snying po de rdo rje'i dbus su rnam par bsams la rdo rje'i nga rgyal bsgom zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i khams de rnams rdo rje las spros te /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-22: de dag gis sems can gyi don bya ba la slar yang rdo rje'i yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-23: de nas rdo rje de la aom bh'um kham zhes bya ba bzlos shing /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-26: dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.3E:66a-27: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-28: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog bcings nas sa ma ya ham zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66a-29: de nyid kyi snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-0: spyi bo rnams su sa ma ya stvam aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya ba rang gi bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab @66b par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-3: dge 'dun gyi phyag rgya chen po /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-4: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba bzlas shing bcing par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-5: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-7: dge 'dun gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bskyed la /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-8: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug par rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-10: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag 'tshal ba sngon du bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-14: dam tshig rnams la ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgom ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-15: slar yang 'dus pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-16: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyin re zhing de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-17: ji srid du nyin re zhing de bzhin du mngon du gyur pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-18: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-19: de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i 'khor lo zlum po ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa bris te /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-20: ras la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dkon mchog gsum bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-21: de nyid kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi ru rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.3E:66b-24: sna tshogs rdo rje sngar bshad pa'i snying po bzhis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-25: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rnam bu'i mtshams bzhi po la snga ma bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-26: sgo rnams su lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:66b-27: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i 'dus pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-1: sogs pa'i cho ga byas la rang 'jug pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-2: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-3: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-5: dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin ni mchog tu gsang ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-6: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-8: de yang yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-9: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dkon mchog gsum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-11: // / de ltar myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-13: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa la myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-14: de nas rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po mchog gi cho ga zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-15: de nas kyi sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-16: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs kho na la zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-17: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-18: chen po yang de yin la khro bo'i rgyal po yang de nyid yin pas na /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-19: rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po ste /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-21: de'i mchog kyang de yin la gsang ba'i cho ga yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ste bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-22: sgrub pa'i ngo bor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-24: yi ge h'um brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-25: lha thams cad kyi snying po brjod cing rang rang gi gnas su lha thams cad kyi gzugs dgod cing drangs te /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-27: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsung pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67a-28: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
T02TD2512.3E:67a-29: da ni ras la bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.3E:67b-0: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs @67b pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:67b-1: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ras la bri par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-2: mchog ces bya ba 'di phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-4: gang gi phyir gsang ba'i cho ga 'di rgya che ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la mdor bsdus pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa de'i phyir mchog ste phul du byung ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-5: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba de'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan gcig kho na'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs dag la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten par bri par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-6: de la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-7: de'i lha mo dang po ni dmar ba dang dkar pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-8: gnyis pa ni thal ba ltar dkar pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-9: gsum pa ni dkar pa dang ljang ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-10: bzhi pa ni gser ltar dri ma med pa'i sku mchog can bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-11: rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug grub //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-12: ces bya ba la kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma ste de grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-13: de nyid rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste ;
T02TD2512.3E:67b-14: rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'i sku gang la mnga' ba de ni kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-15: de ni thal ba ltar sku mdog dkar ba bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-16: de'i yang g-yas logs su dmar ba dang dkar ba'i sku mdog can mda' 'dzin pa rdo rje 'dod pa me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ming can /
T02TD2512.3E:67b-17: g-yon pa'i phyag gis gzhu 'dzin cing g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' bstod pa la brtson pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje khyab 'jug ma ste /
T02TD2512.3E:67b-19: sku mdog dkar ba dang ljang ba dang ;
T02TD2512.3E:67b-20: phyag g-yon gyi sor mo dbus ma'i rtse mos rdo rje 'khor lo bstod pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.3E:67b-21: phyag g-yas bas gden [?] la brten pa dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:67b-22: de'i g-yon logs su dri ma med pa'i gser gyi sku mdog can /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-0: rdo rje dril bu'i ba dan zhes bya ba'i lha mo rdo rje dril bu @68a * //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-1: dang bcas pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsnyems pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-2: phyag g-yas pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-3: de dag thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo khrung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-4: cung zad ma che ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-5: khro dang bcas pa'i zhal bshad pa //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-6: rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-7: sku ni zur gyis phyogs par bzhugs //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-8: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir sprul pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-9: nye ba'i snying po ni hi ste lha thams cad kyi'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-10: de la ya ge h'um gis bsgrub pa ni phra mo'i cho ga gnyis pa las 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba de nyid 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-11: nye ba'i snying po'i sgrub pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir mnyam po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-12: de la mnyam po ni dus gcig tu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i dril bu la sogs pa'i rol mo brdungs shing /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-13: slob ma'i tshogs mkhas pa dang bcas pas yi ge h'um gi glu dang rol mo bya zhing zur bzhi pa'i glu'i sbyor ba nye bar mtshon pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni zur bzhi pa ste rab tu grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-14: de ltar yang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dngos grub kyis te /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-15: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-16: gnas gang du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ras la bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-17: 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i 'khor lo de ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-19: de nyid dam pa ni phul du byung bas te /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-20: brtags pa ni yang dag par brtags nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:68a-22: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-23: mtshon cha mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:68a-24: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni mtshon cha dam pa'i cho ga ste /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-0: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i rim pa'i cho ga @68b des rdo rje'i rigs dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-1: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i rigs las gsungs pa rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-2: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum bo rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la bshad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-4: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-7: dam tshigs ni de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig rnams so //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-8: de rnams kyi cho gas sbyin pa ni cho ga rab tu sbyin pas te slob ma rnams la man ngag sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-9: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu chags pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-10: de las byung ba ste skye ba gang la yod pa de rtag tu chags pa las byung ba'i khro bo ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-11: de'i rdo rje me'i phung bo ni rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba'i tshogs te /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-12: de'i rang bzhin can gyi sku ni sku rnams nyid de /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-13: de dag gang yin zhe na //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-14: rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ste /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-15: de'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma ni de las byung pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po thams cad phyogs bcu dang nam mkha'i khams la bzhugs pa'o ;
T02TD2512.3E:68b-16: /'bar ba zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-17: de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya ba la de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid shes par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-18: lhag par mos pa 'dis de gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-19: de ltar de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan nas chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-20: de nas chos zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:68b-21: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-22: nam mkha'i yang ni mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2512.3E:68b-23: ces bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-0: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad @69a * //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-1: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-2: de bzhin nyid ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-3: de gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-4: des thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-5: myur ba ni myur ba nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i yin te /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-6: de ltar dril bu sgra bsgom zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-7: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-9: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher byin gyis brlabs zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-10: nam mkha' kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-11: thams cad kyang de yin la nam mkha' yang de nyid yin pas na thams cad nam mkha' ste /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-12: rdzas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems so //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-13: de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni thams cad nam mkha'i mchog gi sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-14: thams cad nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la thams cad nam mkha'i mchog gi sbyor ba des 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya ba nang du brjod pa'i rnam pas mngon du bya zhing /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-15: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i chos dang /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-17: phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab pa ni rang gi rang bzhin du byas pa'i 'jig rten gsum yang sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i rang bzhin can za ba ni snang bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-18: yang gi sgras ni phyogs gcig gi dngos po shin tu za bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-19: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams te /
T02TD2512.3E:69a-20: de dag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar dka' ba'i nye par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69a-22: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-0: de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas @69b kyi dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par rnam par bsams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can bdag nyid kyi gzugs su bsams te bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-1: cho ga 'di zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang chos dang /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-2: dam tshig gzung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi mchog thams cad de /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-3: ma lus pa bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-4: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni sems rtse gcig ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-5: bsgrub par bya ba de gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-6: kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-7: rdo rje rigs kyi chos dang /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-9: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnams ni kun mchog dngos grub chen po rnams so //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-10: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i las brgya la sogs pa'i rgyun ni las kyi tshogs so //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-11: kun mchog dngos grub chen po rnams dang /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-12: las kyi tshogs ni kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i las kyi tshogs so //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-13: de yang mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-14: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang phyag rgya rnams kyi gong du nye bar bsdu ba'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-15: rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-17: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa dral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas rdo rje nyi ma med ltar 'bar ba rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-18: dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-19: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:69b-20: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rdzogs par byas nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i rang 'jug pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-21: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i lha rnams kyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:69b-22: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la 'jig gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-0: dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @70a * //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-1: pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba thams cad bzung la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-2: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-3: phyag bzhi dang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag btsal ba byas nas /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-5: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-7: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par byas la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i lcags kyus 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-8: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-9: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-10: de ltar nyin re bzhin du bsgom par byas na ji srid dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-13: rdo rje dril bu sogs mnyam bcas //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-14: rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-15: yi ge hi yi glu rol mo //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-17: zhes bya ba 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-18: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas par byas la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig btab nas /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-19: de nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i thig zlum po 'bar ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-20: ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-21: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bris la /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-22: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas h'um hi zhes bya ba brjod cing /
T02TD2512.3E:70a-23: bcom ldan 'das ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70a-24: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po bzhi pos lha mo bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-0: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi dang sgo bzhi la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs khro bo sgeg mo la sogs pa dang khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu ma @70b la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-1: de la rdo rje ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-2: rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-4: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de gnas pa ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-5: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-6: sgrub pa'i rtog pa bstan pa'o /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-7: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-9: // / de ltar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho bstan nas /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-10: da ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi cho ga gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-12: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa rjod par byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-13: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid du'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-14: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-15: yi ge h'um gis dkyil 'khor sprul te /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-16: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying po rnams kyis lha thams cad dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-17: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-18: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-19: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-20: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob nas bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir shin tu phra ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-21: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:70b-22: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phra ba las kyang shin tu phra ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-23: de bshad pa ni bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:70b-24: 'dir shin tu khro ba sgeg pa ston par byed pas na shin tu gsang ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-0: rdo rje ni rdo rje nyi ma me @71a * //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-2: de'i gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'i phyir chen po de nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-3: ji bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i cho gas grong khyer sum brtsegs dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas yang dag par brgyan la /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-5: rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi slob dpon rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-6: de'i rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan ma thob nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pas yang dag par bris la rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-7: de'i rigs dang rgyan dang ldan pa'i bu mo bzhi dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-8: rang nyid rdo rje drag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-9: de'i dbyibs dang rgyan dang ldan pas gar las byung ba'i me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo rang gi spyi bor bcings la /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-10: h'um rdo rje gzhu dang mda' bcas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi lha'i me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-13: rang gi lha'i snying po rjod par byed pa'i bu mo de rnams dang bcas par dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-14: de nas g-yon pa'i kha ni gyen du bstod //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-15: rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po'i sgra sgrogs mchog gi ming can gyi phyag rgyas ha ha ha ha /
T02TD2512.3E:71a-16: aom badzra ru lu ru lu lam zhes brjod cing dga' ba chen po'i dbugs kyi rlung gis ru lu ni drug dang ldan par bar ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:71a-17: 'di ni 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
