T02TD2512.3E:189a-8: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngag nye bar dgod pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-9: 'di zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-10: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-11: thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-12: bcom ldan 'das ma'i thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i bdag po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs gang yin pa de rnams mi 'gyur mchog go //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-13: don yod pa ni thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-14: myur du ni mchog tu myur ba nyid do //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-15: mchog gi de kho na nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad rjes su chags pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-16: 'dis sgrub par byed pas na sgrub pa ste de nyid cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par te sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par de lta bu yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-17: de ltar rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang de sgom par byed pa ni rnal 'byor dam pas te /
T02TD2512.3E:189a-18: gsang ba chen po yi dam tshig mchog gi rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-19: de'i nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i khyad par 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.3E:189a-20: bsgrub par bya ba yang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na bsgrub par bya ba thams cad de dam tshig dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-21: de rnams kyi rjes su chags pa ni phyag rgya chen po thams cad bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-23: phyag rgya chen po bsgom bya zhing //
T02TD2512.3E:189a-24: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-1: thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su chags par byed par byed par 'gyur pa de dag gis mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-2: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-3: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste de dag kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-4: de ltar na phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su 'di dgos pa yin pas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa las gzhan rigs lnga'i las kyi tshogs rnams su yang thams cad bsgrub pa'i rjes su chags pa dgos pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-5: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la rgyu gang gis bsgrub bya thams cad la rjes su chags pas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-6: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir nges pa'i shes pa 'di dang /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-7: de ston par byed pa'i sgra rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi lha rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i phyir nges pa'i shes rab rnams dang de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i dngos po rnams byed par gyur pa'i sku rnams kyis rab tu grub pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-8: de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcing ba gang gis sgrub pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-9: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rnams kyis so //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-10: rnal 'byor dam tshig sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-11: zhes bya ba la dam tshig ni sgrub pa ste dam tshig sgrub pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-12: byed par gyur pa'i dam tshig sgrub pa de dag gis rnal 'byor rnams grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-13: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma 'dis bsgrub bya thams cad rjes su chags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-14: da ni de nyid snying po la sogs pa'i rab bzhin nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-15: 'di nyid snying gar gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.3E:189b-17: nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya 'di nyid snying po nges pa'i shes par rtag tu 'bras bu'i tshul du gnas pa ni snying gar gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-18: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de'i phyir snying po'o //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-19: dam tshig sgrub pa phyag rgya yi //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-20: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku rdzogs pa ni dam tshig sgrub pa ste dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud de nyid kyi phyir 'di nyid phyag rgya zhes bya bar brjod pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:189b-21: ye shes sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-0: zhes ba ba la rnal 'byor dang @190a * //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-1: rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang thams cad rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin gyi bdag gang yin pa de ni 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-2: rgyu gang gis she na ye shes sbyor ba zhes bya ste phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya 'di nyid nga yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-3: thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir dam tshig go zhes bya ba la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa ni thams cad bsgrub pa ste rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-4: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi dam tshig bdag yin pa de ni 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-5: snying po ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang rnal 'byor ni rnam pa bzhi dang dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu ste nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-6: snying po ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-7: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-9: dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu ste nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya 'di nyid snying po dang phyag rgya dang rnal 'byor dang dam tshig rdzogs par byed pas na thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-10: snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'di nyid sgrub pa po'i rgyud la rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-11: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-13: nges pa'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po ste de las byung ba'i shes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar brtags nas nye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-14: de nas de nyid lung bstan pa ;
T02TD2512.3E:190a-15: / zhes bya ba la rang bzhin ston pa ni lung ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-16: 'dod chags dam tshig brjod pa ste //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-17: zhes bya ba la 'dod chags ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2512.3E:190a-18: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad pas na dam tshig yin la de brjod pa ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-20: zhes bya ba la thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni chos so //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-21: byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems ni 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-22: chos kyang de yin la 'dod pa yang de yin pas na chos 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190a-23: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni yid la brnag pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:190b-0: @190b gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yun ring po nas don du gnyer ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad par mngon par zhen pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-1: 'di'i rjes su sgrub pa ni rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-2: de sgom pa'i cho ga ni rjes su chags pa ste de brjod pa ni bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-3: ci'i phyir chos 'dod pa'i yid la brnag pa rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su chags par brjod kyi chos 'dod pa kho na ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:190b-4: byang chub sems ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-5: 'dod chags chen po de yi lha //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-6: zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir 'dod pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar brjod pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-7: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni lha yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-8: 'dis ni nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das rjes su brjod la thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya nye ba'i snying po de nyid lha zhes brjod pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-9: rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya 'di las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.3E:190b-10: 'di ni thams cad rjes su sgrub //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-11: ces bya ba la 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa ste de'i phyir rjes su sgrub par byed pa 'di yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-12: de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi ston par byed pa'i rgyud bstan nas da ni phyi'i sbyor ba'i rgyud bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.3E:190b-13: de nas rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su babs pa ste /
T02TD2512.3E:190b-14: sgom pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-15: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje ni bi li ka'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-16: rdo rje nor bu ni chu srin sen mo'o //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-18: gur gum dang tsandan ni go sla ba ste cha mnyam pa'i rdzas de rnams kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa byas te lag pas bzung nas yi ge h'um gis stong phrag brgyar mngon par bsngags la /
T02TD2512.3E:190b-19: de dang de'i tshul gyis dpal rdo rje sems dpar gsungs pa'i las brgya po rnams des bsgrub par byas na bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:190b-20: ba li ka dang tsandan dkar po dang /
T02TD2512.3E:191a-0: prika dang nor bu dang mu tig cha mnyam pa rnams @191a * //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-1: kyis sman byas la snga ma bzhin du stong phrag mngon bar bsngags nas nor bu 'ching bar gzung bar byas te /
T02TD2512.3E:191a-2: 'di yang tshul de dang des las brgya bsgrub par byas na bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-8: ka cha mnyam pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i gnas byas la de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas par byas la de bzhin gshegs par gsungs pa'i las brgya bsam pa'i dbang gis phye mar byas pa tsam gyis 'grub bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-10: tu rushka dang tsandan dkar po dang //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-12: bu ram cha mnyam pa dang ldan pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i snying po stong phrag brgya mngon bar bsngags pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang du gsungs pa'i las brgya bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-13: rdo dreg dang sardza sa dang til rnams cha mnyam pa la gu gul bcug ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sngags stong phrag brgya yongs su bzlas pa byas nas mar me spar bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.3E:191a-14: mar me 'dis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu gsungs pa'i las brgya bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-18: ga bur cha mnyam rnams kyis spos kyi sbyor ba byas la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po lan 'bum yongs su bzlas pa byas na des bdag nyid la yang dag par byugs la spos gtul bar bya ste de ltar 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs pa'i las brgya bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-19: dum bu gsum pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:191a-21: // / dum bu bzhi pa la yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni dum bu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang thams cad 'dra ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-22: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te sna tshogs pa'i gos kyis g-yogs par gyur pa'i slob dpon gyis rdo rje mchod pa'i thal mo sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-23: slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya //
T02TD2512.3E:191a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2512.3E:191a-26: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2512.3E:191b-0: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang ming po gsum dang @191b sring mo bzhi dang /
T02TD2512.3E:191b-1: klu dang sdug bsngal las gdon pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang 'dra ba yin no //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-2: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te thig skud bdun ba'i bar mtshams kyi phyi rol gyi mtshams rnams su ming po gsum dang sring mo bzhi dang /
T02TD2512.3E:191b-3: klu dang sdug bsngal las gdon pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-4: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-5: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba ste /
T02TD2512.3E:191b-7: aom nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-8: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi glus spyan drang ba dang lha mo rnams kyang 'dir rdo rje rin po ches dbang bskur bas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2512.3E:191b-10: 'phags ba nam mkha'i snying po'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-11: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dpal mchog dang bo'i dum bu bzhi pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:191b-14: byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya che //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-15: lus can kun gyis thob pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-16: 'jig rten snang byed dge ba yi //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-17: dum bu dang po gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-18: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin phyag rgya //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-19: dam tshig ces grags rtag tu dge / bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-20: dum bu gnyis pa gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-21: shes rab pha rol phyin chos kyi //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-22: phyag rgya kun 'gro rtag pa ste //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-23: ltas ngan thams cad 'jig byed pa'i //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-24: dum bu gsum pa gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-25: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin las kyi //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-26: phyag rgya kun yang yang dag gnas //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-27: blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-28: bsam mi khyab pa bzhi par gsungs //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-29: lha yi dbang po'i gnas dang mtshungs //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-30: rgyal po mu rgya'i gnas kyis mdzes //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-31: sngags zhes rin chen tshogs pa'i sa //
T02TD2512.3E:191b-32: sna tshogs brtsegs pa nyams dga'i ri //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-2: shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-3: bshad pa bdag gis byas pa las //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-4: dge ba bsags pa gang yin des //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi kun dga' che //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-6: snying po khyab bdag bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-7: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal gyur cig //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-9: lus can kun gyis rgyal ba yi //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-10: ye shes thob phyir gzhung gi grangs //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-11: 'di yi tshad du bshad pa ni //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-12: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-13: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon kun dga' snying bos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.3E:192a-16: // / gug ge'i yul gyi dbus byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dam sa'i snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mantra ka la sha dang /
T02TD2512.3E:192a-17: sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba chen po bod kyi dpal lha btsan po byang chub sems dpa'i gdung rgyud lha bla ma dge slong zhi ba 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-18: sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-19: lha rigs byang chub sems dpa'i sprul ba ni //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-20: sa stengs rgyal ba'i rgyal por sku 'khrungs pa //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-21: bla ma byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes 'od //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-22: mnga' ris stod 'di gdul ba'i don du byung //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-23: gsang sngags spyod pa'i chos lugs kun nyams dang //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-24: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg cho ga nub gyur pas //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-25: dkyil 'khor cho ga padma stong ldan te //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-26: de bzhin sbyin sreg shag ti shug tis byed //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-27: gzhan yang gsang sngags sbas don nub gyur cing //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-28: sbyor sgrol dang ni tshogs la sogs pas bslad //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-29: 'di rnams don nges btsal phyir bkas gnyer te //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-30: lo ts'a rin chen bzang po kha cher brdzangs //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-31: shraddha ka ra zhes bya spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-32: sgron gsal spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma sogs //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-33: bsgyur cing bshad nas sngags log gzhung bsal zhing //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-34: sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po'i lugs la btsud //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-35: de bzhin dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg cho ga dang //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-36: sgom sgrub la sogs bye brag sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-37: skyon med gzhung lugs kun la 'gro kun sbyar //
T02TD2512.3E:192a-38: skal ldan rnams la dbang sogs rim bzhin stsal //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-0: deng sang bar du sngags kyi gzhung @192b dar ba //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-1: lo ts'a skyes mchog de yi drin yin grang //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-2: shraddha ka ra zhes bya'i mkhas pa dang //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-3: rin chen sgron 'dra rin chen bzang po yis //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-4: rnal 'byor rgyud don tshul bzhin bshad mod kyis //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-5: de yi gang mas ngag nub par gyur pa nas //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-6: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi ji bzhin don ma rtogs //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-7: yang dag don la nor pa'i dri mas bslad //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-8: 'khrul pa de dag bsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-9: rgyal sa'i dam pa gug ge'i yul dbus kyi //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-10: thugs dam sa yi snying po tho ling du //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-11: bla ma zhi ba 'od kyi zham ring la //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-12: rig pa'i 'byung gnas grong khyer dpe med kyi //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-13: rje'u rigs mchog gi nang du sku la brungs pa //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-14: thos pa mang zhing mkhyen par ldan pa yi //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-15: mkhas pa mchog gyur sngags kyi bum pa la //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-16: gsol ba btab nas bdag gis bsgyur ba las //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-17: sgra don tha snyad la mkhas byung gyur na //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-18: tshig don brtags nas rigs pas bcos par gyis //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-19: sgra yi bstan bcos mtha' dag ma bslabs shing//
T02TD2512.3E:192b-20: bod kyi tha snyad kun la ma byang pas //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-21: rgya gar skad tsam nyi tshe shes gyur kyang //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-22: nga rgyal 'ba' zhig tsam gyis bcos mi bya //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-23: don 'di rnam par phye ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-24: 'khor ba'i khongs chud 'gro ba rigs lnga po //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-25: rnal 'byor lnga bsgoms las lnga mthar phyin nas //
T02TD2512.3E:192b-26: ye shes lnga rdzogs rigs lnga'i sku thob shog /
